4.7.16  10:25 am   Bill, may I call you Bill? I am an instructional designer (teacher of teachers) at a Technology School in Oklahoma I think your video style would be VERY engaging for students. Have you ever given any thought to teaching teachers (or teaching teachers of teachers) how you create videos for instruction? If teachers presented information in the same style as your "History of Japan" video, students would watch it multiple times. And/Or, would you consider doing a video chat with some students in a digital media classroom?

4.7.16  2:12 am   Hello Bill! I am often disassociating and very frustrated/sad/angry/synonyms for not okay. Your videos and music make me feel better and more like a person because they are something that I can relate too yet also find joy out of. When you first started uploading music, was your intention to connect to people in this way or in any other way regarding emotions and things like that, or was it more for a purely self-indulgent hobby that you didn't expect an audience to gravitate to? Either way, I'm very glad that you're so dedicated to what you produce and thankful that you exist in the online community.
